mapper.select: select TOP 1 Convert(decimal(18,2),sum(t2.taxamount)) as totalAmount, max(t3.name) as storename,max(t1.code) as code, MAX(CONVERT(varchar(100), t1.createdtime, 20)) as voucherdate, MAX(t4.AppKey) AS AppKey,max(t4.AppSecret) as AppSecret, max(t4.companytaxnum) as taxnum,max(t4.token) as token from re_retail t1,re_retail_b t2,AA_DR_Store t3,nuonuo_code_token t4 where t1.code = #{code} and t1.id = t2.idRetailDTO and t1.idstore = t3.id AND t3.iddistrict = t4.iddistrict group by t1.id
mapper.update: update nuonuo_code_token set token = #{newToken} where appKey = #{appKey}
mapper.select: select t3.name as goodsname,t2.quantity,t2.taxamount,t4.name as unitname,t3.priuserdefnvc1 as ssflbm from re_retail t1,re_retail_b t2 ,AA_inventory t3,AA_unit t4 where t1.id = t2.idRetailDTO and t1.code = #{code} and t2.idInventory = t3.id and t3.idUnit = t4.id
select access_token from XXX_code_token where AppKey = #{AppKey}
